contents.text: Welcome to PeopleGrove in San Francisco, reimagining mentorship for today’s students and professionals.
If you are a student or professional seeking mentorship, press 1.
To learn how to create your mentee profile and find suitable mentors, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our mentee services team.

navigationGoals: Help me set up my mentee profile and connect with a mentor quickly.
I need help setting up my mentee profile and finding a mentor for my civilian career transition.
I need to configure my mentee profile and use advanced filters to find a software engineering mentor
I need help setting up my mentee profile and finding a suitable mentor.
Help me set up my mentee profile so I can connect with a physics mentor

contents.text: To explore mentorship opportunities as a mentor and learn about eligibility, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our mentor recruitment team.

navigationGoals: Tell me the eligibility criteria and process to join as a mentor.
I want to sign up as a mentor to support fellow veterans entering civilian workplaces.
I want to review mentor eligibility guidelines and register as a mentor specializing in data science
I’d like information on how I can volunteer as a mentor and what qualifications are required.
I’d like to sign up as a mentor and find out if I’m eligible

contents.text: If you represent an institution or partner interested in enterprise solutions, press 2.
For information on our college partnership programs and offerings, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: Provide me details on college partnership options for our institution.
I’m calling on behalf of my veteran support organization to discuss partnering with your college programs.
I need information on enterprise integration for our university partnership, including API and SSO setup
I’m calling on behalf of my community center to learn about your college partnership offerings.
I want information on your college partnership programs for my physics department

contents.text: For technical assistance with the PeopleGrove platform, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: I need urgent technical support for the PeopleGrove platform.
I’m having trouble accessing my PeopleGrove account and need technical assistance.
I need technical assistance resolving OAuth login errors and token refresh failures on the PeopleGrove platform
I’m having trouble accessing the PeopleGrove platform and need technical assistance.
I need technical assistance navigating the PeopleGrove mentorship platform
